dcterms:creator: H. Huang
dcterms:description: This dataset contains the taxi trajectory data of Shenzhen from January 1 to January 31, 2015, focusing on 156 major roads in the Luohu District. It includes an adjacency matrix representing the spatial relationships between roads and a feature matrix detailing the traffic speed changes over time, aggregated every 15 minutes.
dcterms:title: SZ-taxi

dcterms:creator: J. Liu
W. Guan
dcterms:description: This dataset was collected in real-time from loop detectors on highways in Los Angeles County, focusing on 207 sensors and their traffic speed from March 1 to March 7, 2012. The data includes an adjacency matrix based on the distance between sensors and a feature matrix detailing traffic speed, aggregated every 5 minutes.
dcterms:title: Los-loop
